title: Ep 252 | Phil & Jase Take Baffling First Trips to Hobby Lobby & Why It’s Hard to Call It Good Friday
description:
Jase gives an update on Mia and explains his role in her recovery, including his head-spinning first trip to Hobby Lobby. That leads to a question: What exactly is glitter? Phil is reminded of his one and only trip to Hobby Lobby. And the guys talk about why it’s hard to call it Good Friday and how Jesus’ death rippled through time and solved all of our problems — including sin and death — in just 72 hours.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
